tool_description: Images analyser API for multi-label object detection and classification!
title: LexAI API

api_list.name: show_detected_data
api_list.description: This API request allows you to detect bounding boxes on an image and retrieve the results in a structured dictionary format. You can provide the image either by specifying a URL or by uploading a file. The API will process the image and return a dictionary containing information about the detected bounding boxes. Each bounding box entry in the dictionary includes details such as the coordinates, label, and confidence score.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lexai-api.p.rapidapi.com/detection_results"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lexai-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: show_detections
api_list.description: This API request allows you to detect and visualize bounding boxes on an image. You can provide the image either by specifying a URL or by uploading a file. The API will process the image and return a new image with the detected bounding boxes drawn on it.

api_list.name: get_classes
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lexai-api.p.rapidapi.com/get_classes"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lexai-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

Each bounding box entry in the dictionary includes details such as the coordinates, label, and confidence score.
